Summary: Light that looked like street light then slowly moved away
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were riding our bicycles in the evening and my son noticed a light hovering over an open field. I noticed there was no pole indicating this was a street light. We stood right under it for about 3 minutes then it slowly moved away. We looked for anything attached to the light but could see nothing but what looked like a street lamp. My son and I looked at each other and didnt know what to think.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Southbridge
There were no other sightings in Southbridge on or around August 16th 1989
